title: My parents gave me the Covid vaccine and it's been nearly a year, is there any way to detox it before it has negative long term effects?
description: Answer (1 of 9): Stop listening to anti-vaccine idiots. No one needs to detox from any vaccination. All it does is give your body some information about a dangerous disease so your immune system can be prepared to fight it. Getting Covid is a thousand times more harmful to you than the vaccine....
